William Charles Winshaw, bụ dibịa America nke kere Stellenbosch Farmer's Winery (SFW) na South Africa na 1935
A mụrụ ya na Kentucky, USA na 21 Nọvemba 1871 ma nwụọ na South Africa na 11 Machị 1968
O nwekwara ubi vaịn Oude Libertas n'ebe ahụ ma mepụta Lieberstein, mmanya ọcha akọrọ. Ọ lụrụ Ada Charlotte (Day) na Susan Valerie
SFW jikọtara ya na Distillers Corporation na Disemba 4, 2000 iji mepụta Distell Group Limited.
